## Variable.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Variable` class

<b>Signature:</b>


## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                     |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------- |
| symbol    | string | Symbol for variable such as "x" |
